title: New font editor software
content:
I have built a new font editor-designer program.

Please download it here and let me know what you think:

[www.CR8.netfirms.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829040151/http:/www.cr8.netfirms.com/ "www.CR8.netfirms.com")

the name of the software is ’CR8type’ and is for  
True Type font design.

Allan Murray

 [‹ How do I export special characters using Corel Draw 10?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829040151/http:/typophile.com/node/14062 "Go to previous forum topic") [Difficulty in adjusting the horizontal scale of a SimSun ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829040151/http:/typophile.com/node/13968 "Go to next forum topic")
author: allanm1
